text: int main ( ) { long long int A [ size ] , B [ size ] , i , N , pos , sum ; int T , count ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { sum = 0 ; pos = 1 ; scanf ( "%lld" , & N ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & A [ i ] ) ; i = 0 ; while ( pos < N ) { if ( A [ i ] > A [ pos ] ) { sum += A [ pos ] ; i = pos ; pos ++ ; } else { sum += A [ i ] ; pos ++ ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
